00007 class qcl_jsonrpc_config_db extends qcl_jsonrpc_db_pear
00008 {    
00009    
00013         function __construct()
00014         {
00015                 parent::__construct();
00016         }
00017  
00021         function set($name,$value)
00022         {
00023                 $res = $this->db->getAllRows("SELECT id FROM config WHERE name = '$name'");
00024                 $id  = $res[0]['id'];
00025                 if ( $id )
00026                 {
00027                         $this->execute("UPDATE config SET value = '$value' WHERE id = $id ");
00028                 }
00029                 else
00030                 {
00031                         $this->execute("INSERT INTO config (name,value) VALUES ('$name','$value')");
00032                         return $this->getLastInsertId();
00033                 }
00034         }         
00035 }
